item.title: Intense competition, surprising turns, and exciting catches. Will you be the next top angler?
item.description:
Intense competition, surprising turns, and exciting catches. Will you be the next top angler?

The Bass Fishing Board Game involves moving around the board to different fishing spots with your boat pawn. At those spots you can use a combination of lures, action cards and dice for a chance to land a big bass. The object of the game is to fill your live well with 5 of the largest fish. At the end of the tournament, each playerâ€™s live well weight is calculated and a winner is determined.
